titles.title: Local Transportation Infrastructure Act
A bill to amend title 23, United States Code, to reauthorize the State infrastructure bank program.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.

term.name: Urban and suburban affairs and development

bill.summary:
1/21/2015--Introduced. Local Transportation Infrastructure Act
Revises and reauthorizes the state infrastructure bank program for FY2015 and FY2016.
